title: SOLD - Elberfeld New York Piedmont 150 - Raw - Well Centered
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: SOLD - Elberfeld New York Piedmont 150 - Raw - Well Centered
posts.post_content:
I bought this card [url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/151567658100[/url] thinking it would be neat to soak the other card from the back to see what it was, especially since it's a 150 series. Well it was only half of another card... not sure why someone would re-back a 150 with a 150...

Anyway, I'm not even going to try and take a shot at guessing what this might grade specifically (but likely low, per the back issues), but it presents well.

SOLD

Pay however you like.
Emails have priority: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]

Thanks for looking!
Thank you, Tony. I've replied. Standing by for payment.
